Text: Kuzakubakho izulu elisibakeleyo ekupheleni, elithe gqabagqaba ngamafu esiphakathini kunye nelimathumb' antaka ekupheleni kwemini
Kuzakubakho izulu elisibakeleyo jikelele imini yonke
Kuzakubakho izulu elisibakeleyo ekuqaleni nasesiphakathini semini, nangona liyakujika kubekho elimathumb' antaka ekupheleni
Kuzakubakho izulu elisibakeleyo ekuqaleni kwemini, nangona liyakujika kubekho elithe gqabagqaba ngamafu ekupheleni nasesiphakathini
Kuzakubakho izulu elihle kulemini izayo, nangona ngamanye amaxesha kuzakubakho izulu elimathumb' antaka
Silindele utshintsho-ntsitshwano lwezulu elisibakeleyo nelihle kwezintsuku zizayo, nangona emaxesheni athile kuzakubakho izulu elithe gqabagqaba ngamafu
Kuzakubakho izulu elihle kubekho namaxesha apho kukho izulu elimathumb' antaka okanye elisibakeleyo
Iqondo eliphantsi lemozulu liphezulu kakhulu kwaye neqondo eliphezulu liphantsi kakhulu xa lithelekiswa netempritsha elindelekileyo kwelixesha enyakeni, kodwa ndawo yonke itemprisha ihla ngamandla
Iqondo eliphantsi lemozulu liphantsi kakhulu kwaye neqondo eliphezulu liphantsi kakhulu xa lithelekiswa netempritsha elindelekileyo kwelixesha enyakeni, kodwa ndawo yonke itemprisha izakunyuka isehla

Iqondo eliphantsi lemozulu liphantsi kakhulu kwaye iqondo eliphezulu liphantsi kakhulu xa lithelekiswa nethemprisha elindelekileyo kwelixesha enyakeni, iqondo eliphantsi lona linyuka ngamandla ekuhambeni kwexesha

Iqondo eliphantsi lemozulu liphezulu kakhulu kwaye iqondo eliphezulu liphantsi kakhulu xa lithelekiswa nethempritsha elindelekileyo kwelixesha enyakeni, nangona amaqondo azakunyuka esehla ekuhambeni kwexesha

Iqondo eliphantsi lemozulu liphantsi kakhulu kwaye iqondo eliphezulu liphezulu kakhulu xa lithelekiswa nethemprisha elindelekileyo kwelixesha enyakeni, kwaye iqondo eliphezulu linyuka kancinci-kancinci ekuhambeni kwexesha
Iqondo eliphantsi lemozulu liphezulu kakhulu kwaye iqondo eliphezulu liphantsi kakhulu xa lithelekiswa nethemprisha elindelekileyo kwelixesha enyakeni, nangona amaqondo azakunyuka esehla
Amaqondo obushushu azakuba ephantsi kakhulu ngelixesha enyakeni, kodwa ndawo yonke itemprisha inyuka ngamandla
Amaqondo obushushu azakuba ephantsi kakhulu ngelixesha enyakeni, nangona amaqondo azakunyuka esehla
Amaqondo obushushu azakuba ephezulu kakhulu ngelixesha enyakeni, iqondo eliphantsi lona lihla kancinci
Amaqondo obushushu azakuba ephantsi kakhulu ngelixesha enyakeni, nangona amaqondo awazokunyuka esehla
Amaqondo obushushu azakuba ephantsi kakhulu ngelixesha enyakeni, kwaye amaqondo aphezulu anyuka kancinci ekuhambeni kwexesha
Amaqondo obushushu azakuba ephantsi kakhulu ngelixesha enyakeni, nangona amaqondo awazokunyuka esehla ekuhambeni kwexesha
Silindele umoya onamandla amakhulu ukusuka emantla ngomvulo
Silindele imimoya ezakuba namandla amakhulu ukusuka emzantsi-mpuma ngomvulo
Silindele imimoya ezakuba namandla amakhulu ukusuka emantla-ntshona ukuqala ngolwesithathu, itshintse ibe namandla ukusuka emntla-mpuma ngolwesihlanu
Imo yesibhakabhaka izokuhluka kakhulu kwimini yonke
